column2: IDEA-200434: Avoid creation of new ijinit.gradle scripts

column3: In GradleExecutionHelper improved check that ijinit.gradle script with corresponding content does not exist. Avoiding creation of new gradle init scripts should improve performance of configuration phase of a gradle build.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
Also we can avoid unnecessary file content comparison using different prefixes for most of scenarios.

Thanks for the PR, I've pushed the fix with modifications.
You can find the change at 5c5cc8b
